title: How to Manage Labels in Gmail: Create, Delete, & Edit

steps.title: Open the Gmail app.
steps.content: Open the Gmail app. This looks like a multicolored M icon. If you aren't already logged into your Gmail account, do so now. You can't create, edit, or delete labels in the Gmail app for Android. You can only do so on desktop or on the iOS version .

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the top-left corner of the screen. A pop-out menu will appear.

steps.title: Scroll down to the "All labels" section.
steps.content: Scroll down to the "All labels" section. You'll find this section about halfway down the pop-out menu. This is where all of your custom labels are stored.

steps.title: Add a label to emails.
steps.content: Add a label to emails. To add a label to a single or multiple emails, do the following: Tap the sender's profile image next to the email(s). Tap ⋮ in the top-right corner. Tap Change labels . Select the label. Tap OK .

steps.title: Change the label of an email.
steps.content: Change the label of an email. If you want to move a labeled email to another label, do the following: Open the labeled email. Tap ⋮ in the top-right corner. Tap Change labels . Deselect the current label. Select the new label. Tap OK .

steps.title: Open the Gmail app.
steps.content: Open the Gmail app. This looks like a multicolored M icon. If you aren't already logged into your Gmail account, do so now.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is in the top-left corner of the screen. A pop-out menu will appear.

steps.title: Scroll down to the "Labels" section.
steps.content: Scroll down to the "Labels" section. You'll find this section about halfway down the pop-out menu. This is where all of your custom labels are stored.

steps.title: Add a new label.
steps.content: Add a new label. If you want to create a label, scroll down and tap Create new . Enter a name and tap Save .

steps.title: Delete a label.
steps.content: Delete a label. This will remove the label from your inbox, though it won't delete the label's emails: Tap ☰ in the top-left corner. Tap Settings . Tap Inbox customizations . Tap Labels . Tap the label. Tap Delete [label] . Tap Delete .

steps.title: Add a label to emails.
steps.content: Add a label to emails. To add a label to a single or multiple emails, do the following: Tap the sender's profile image next to the email(s). Tap ••• in the top-right corner. Tap Change labels . Select the label. Tap the checkmark icon.

steps.title: Change the label of an email.
steps.content: Change the label of an email. If you want to move a labeled email to another label, do the following: Open the labeled email. Tap ••• in the top-right corner. Tap Change labels . Uncheck the current label. Select the new label. Tap the checkmark icon.

steps.title: Label emails automatically.
steps.content: Label emails automatically. You can add labels to certain incoming emails. Do the following: Tap ☰ in the top-left corner. Tap Settings . Tap Inbox customizations . Tap Labels . Tap a label. Tap Add . Enter a name or email address in the From field. Tap And to add more search criteria. Tap Save .

steps.title: Open Gmail in a web browser.
steps.content: Open Gmail in a web browser. This will open your Gmail inbox if you're logged in. If you aren't logged in, enter your email address and password when prompted. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the "Settings" gear .
steps.content: Click the "Settings" gear . It's in the upper-right side of the page. Doing so prompts a sidebar.

steps.title: Click See all settings.
steps.content: Click See all settings . You'll see this at the top of the sidebar.

steps.title: Click Labels.
steps.content: Click Labels . It's a tab at the top of the Settings page.

steps.title: Scroll down to the "Labels" section.
steps.content: Scroll down to the "Labels" section. This is where all of your custom labels are listed.

steps.title: Add a label.
steps.content: Add a label. If you want to create a new label, do the following: Click the grey Create new label button. Enter a name for the label. Check the "Nest label under" box and select a label if you want to place your new label inside of another label. Click Create .

steps.title: Remove a label.
steps.content: Remove a label. If you want to delete a label, click Remove to the far-right side of the label, then click Delete when prompted. Unlike deleting a folder on a computer, removing a label will not remove the emails inside of it.

steps.title: Add a label to an email.
steps.content: Add a label to an email. Adding emails to a label is similar to placing emails in a folder. Do the following: Click Inbox on the left side of the page to return to your inbox. Click the checkbox on the left of each email you want to add to a label. Click ⋮ at the top toolbar. Click Label as . Click the label you want to use.

steps.title: Change the label of an email.
steps.content: Change the label of an email. If you want to move a labeled email to another label, do the following: Click Inbox on the left side of the page to return to your inbox. Click the checkbox on the left of each email you want to add to a label. Click ⋮ at the top toolbar. Click Label as . Uncheck the current label. Select a new label.
